metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37156 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Redmine 4.2.0 and 4.2.1 allow existing user sessions to continue uponenabling two-factor authentication for the user's account, but the intendedbehavior is for those sessions to be terminated.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
